page.title: 05KENT COLLEGE
page.content: {Independent School}(Some government assisted places).Founded 1885(This is centenary year).Methodist associations, non-conformist bias. {Fees}:termly tuition:678pounds(day pupils) 573pounds(boarding){Staff}53 {Pupils}568(166girls,402 boys){Ages}11- 18 {Courses}"O"Levels 90 "A"Levels 79 {Subjects}22 {Facilities} Sports:Gym. 90 acre field,30 tennis courts,swimming pool.{Leisure}Drama,chess,computing, riding,sailing,Christian Union. {Uniform} maroon,blue,grey. {Pupil Andrew}:"At 7.15a.m. the rising bell goes and most people get up,wash, dress, and go downstairs to the dining room.....On Saturdays and Sundays School ends at 12.10 and there is no prep. on Sunday ". {Visitor:Eleanor} "We saw the dormitories. The children had to bring their own quilts,and put up posters;rooms not exactly tidy!" ."
